csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <citation>
		<sort>
			<key variable="citation-number"/>
		</sort>
		<layout prefix="(" suffix=")" delimiter="," font-weight="bold">
			<text variable="citation-number" prefix="[" suffix="]"/>
		</layout>
	</citation>
</style>
